anathema: Allow yourself and your surroundings to stagnate, crush an egg, use vile or cruel language
edict: Embrace change and the future, master adversity with flexibility, foster freedom and progress for others
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Uvuko (The Diamond Ring)](/Deities.aspx?ID=682)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=237) pg. 18

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Mwangi Gods](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=20)

**Edicts** Embrace change and the future, master adversity with flexibility, foster freedom and progress for others

**Anathema** Allow yourself and your surroundings to stagnate, crush an egg, use vile or cruel language

**Area of Concern**
Metamorphosis, cycles, growth, fertility

**Pantheons**
[Guardians Of The Sacred Self](/Deities.aspx?ID=379)

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Wisdom

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36)

**Favored Weapon** [Maul](/Weapons.aspx?ID=388)

**Domains** [Change](/Domains.aspx?ID=102), [Creation](/Domains.aspx?ID=68), [Dragon](/Domains.aspx?ID=106), [Healing](/Domains.aspx?ID=78)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Air](/Domains.aspx?ID=65), [Cold](/Domains.aspx?ID=103)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Fleet Step](/Spells.aspx?ID=1531)

- **3rd**
[Haste](/Spells.aspx?ID=1553)

- **4th**
[Aerial Form](/Spells.aspx?ID=1437)

</column>
name: Uvuko (The Diamond Ring)
